00012 class OptionsError : public std::exception {
00013   const char* what() const throw () {
00014     return "Bad MODULES option";

00018 CFTimeAPGenerator::CFTimeAPGenerator(TAPGeneratorOptions* opts):
00019         TVAnalysedPulseGenerator("CFTime",opts){
00020   //fConstantFraction = opts->GetDouble("constfrac", 0.1);
00021   fConstantFraction = 0.2;
00022   if (fConstantFraction <= 0. || fConstantFraction >=100.)
00023     throw OptionsError();
00024 }
00025 
00026 int CFTimeAPGenerator::ProcessPulses(const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00027                                      AnalysedPulseList& analysedList) {
00028   static const double th_frac = 0.25;
00029 
00030   TSetupData* setup = TSetupData::Instance();
00031   unsigned int max = std::pow(2, setup->GetNBits(pulseList[0]->GetBankName())) - 1;
00032 
00033   int pol = pulseList[0]->GetTriggerPolarity();
00034   for (unsigned int iTPI = 0; iTPI < pulseList.size(); ++iTPI) {
00035     TPulseIsland* tpi = pulseList.at(iTPI);
00036     std::vector<int> samps = tpi->GetSamples();
00037     std::vector<int>::iterator b = samps.begin(), e = samps.end();
00038     unsigned int ped = std::accumulate(b, b + 5, 0)/5.;
00039     std::vector<int>::iterator m = pol > 0 ? std::max_element(b, e) : std::min_element(b, e);
00040     unsigned int amp = *m;
00041     unsigned int thresh = pol > 0 ? (unsigned int)(th_frac*(double)(max - ped) + ped) : (unsigned int)((1.-th_frac)*ped);
00042     unsigned int cf = pol > 0 ? (unsigned int)(fConstantFraction*(double)(amp-ped)) + ped : (unsigned int)((double)(ped-amp)*(1.-fConstantFraction) + amp);
00043     if ((pol > 0 ? amp > thresh : amp < thresh) && (pol > 0 ? amp < max : amp > 0)) {
00044       std::vector<int>::iterator c = m;
00045       while ((pol > 0 ? *--m > (int)cf : *--m < (int)cf) && m != b);
00046       double t;
00047       if (*(m+1) == *m)
00048         t = (double)(m-b);
00049       else
00050       t = (double)((int)cf - *m)/(double)(*(m+1) - *m) + (double)(m-b);
00051       TAnalysedPulse* tap = MakeNewTAP(iTPI);
00052       tap->SetTime(tpi->GetClockTickInNs() * (t + (double)tpi->GetTimeStamp()) - TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(tpi->GetBankName()));
00053       analysedList.push_back(tap);
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   return 0;
00058 }
00059 
00060 // Similar to the modules, this macro registers the generator with
00061 // MakeAnalysedPulses. The first argument is compulsory and gives the name of
00062 // this generator. All subsequent arguments will be used as names for arguments
00063 // given directly within the modules file.  See the github wiki for more.
00064 //
00065 // NOTE: for TAP generators OMIT the APGenerator part of the class' name
00066 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(CFTime);
